item.title: Speaking like a president
item.description: Natural language processing on the first 2016 presidential debate originally published on Fouriest Series The first debate in the 2016 presidential race was held on September 26. Itâ€™s no secret that Clinton and Trump are running on drastically different platforms, but how do they compare when it comes to their speech patterns and word choice? To quantify this, I dug into the data, using the debate transcript and natural language processing.
